name: Alien Shooter Collection
description:
The continuation of the alien invasion story includes new missions and levels full of endless hordes of monsters. You'll have to return to abandoned laboratories to find a secret virus that can put a stop to the alien invasion once and for all!
An Experiment
The virus designed to kill the monsters was a failure. The scientists are taking drastic measures: they're creating new monsters which should be able to kill their predecessors. Did the scientists' plan work, or has something gone wrong?

1 player
10MB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
